ISSUE.TITLE: [bug]: Dashboard reports all tasks as overdue
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Is there an existing issue for this? - [X] I have searched the existing issues ### Current behavior When I view the dashboard, I am shown 26 issues overdue (all issues I have created) ![image](https://github.com/makeplane/plane/assets/76532245/73e25510-cba8-4926-ab52-dacea4438245) Going to the assigned tab shows no issues overdue. ![image](https://github.com/makeplane/plane/assets/76532245/9c7cbacb-ee87-41e1-8a57-10dfaec481b6) ### Steps to reproduce This issue is visible from the dashboard at all times. I have tasks with no date and due dates in the future. I am running v0.15.1 ### Browser Google Chrome ### Version Local
